message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $10,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. $7,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to move a little. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,200?
